title: President Donald J. Trump Announces Presidential Delegation to Strasbourg, France and Speyer, Germany, to Attend the Funeral of Dr. Helmut J. M. Kohl, Former German Chancellor and Citizen of Honor of Europe – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
June 30, 2017
President Donald J. Trump today announced the designation of a Presidential Delegation to Strasbourg, France and Speyer, Germany to attend the Funeral of Dr. Helmut J. M. Kohl, Former German Chancellor and Citizen of Honor of Europe on July 1, 2017.The Honorable Daniel Ray Coats, Director of National Intelligence and former Ambassador to Germany, will lead the delegation.Members of the Presidential Delegation:Mr. Kent D. Logsdon, Charge d’Affaires ad interim, United States Embassy in Berlin, GermanyMr. Conrad Tribble, Deputy Assistant Secretary, Bureau for European and Eurasian Affairs, United States Department of State
